mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shop_auth_map (employee_id, shop_id, title, title_flag, create_time, last_edit_time, enable_status) VALUES (#{employee.userId}, #{shop.shopId}, #{title}, #{titleFlag}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{enableStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT smap.shop_auth_id, smap.title, smap.title_flag, smap.create_time, smap.last_edit_time, smap.enable_status, p.user_id, p.name, s.shop_id, s.shop_name FROM tb_shop_auth_map smap, tb_person_info p, tb_shop s WHERE smap.employee_id = p.user_id AND smap.shop_id = s.shop_id AND smap.shop_id = #{shopId} LIMIT #{rowIndex}, #{pageSize};
SELECT count(1) FROM tb_shop_auth_map smap, tb_person_info p, tb_shop s WHERE smap.employee_id = p.user_id AND smap.shop_id = s.shop_id AND smap.shop_id = #{shopId}
